member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.ConnectionContext
member.summary: Establishes the context for the database connection that is associated with the database unit test.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.ConnectionContext.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Gets the time (in seconds) that elapses before the command that executes the batch statement times out.
member.exception: The value used to set CommandTimeout is less than zero (0).

member.summary: Gets or sets the database connection.

member.summary: Gets or sets a provider that is associated with the connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.ConnectionContext.Transaction
member.summary: Gets or sets the transactions to use when executing the Transact SQL (T-SQL) statements.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestAction
member.summary: Represents a set of Transact-SQL (T-SQL) batch statements and test conditions to validate whether the statement executed correctly.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the collection of test conditions that are associated with the set of Transact-SQL (T-SQL) statements.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestAction.SqlScript
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of Transact-SQL (T-SQL) statements.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the T-SQL statement(s) and test conditions that are executed after test execution.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestActions.TestAction
member.summary: Gets or sets the T-SQL statement(s) and test conditions that are executed during the test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestService.DeployDatabaseProject
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, deploys the database project prior to the unit test being run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestService.DeployDatabaseProject(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deploys a database project to the database specified in the referenced configuration.
member.param: The path to the database project file.
The solution build configuration that should be used when executing the deployment MSBuild task.
The database client provider used to connect to the database. This must be .
The connection string for the target database. This must be a connection string to a SQL database.

member.summary: Executes the supplied and evaluates the results of the execution using each contained in the DatabaseTestAction's collection.
member.param: The context to use when executing the T-SQL in the .
The context to use when validating the test conditions.
The DatabaseTestAction to execute.
Zero or more DbParameters that will be provided in the executed T-SQL.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestService.GenerateData
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, generates data to specified database project prior to the unit test being run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.DatabaseTestService.GenerateData(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates data to the specified database using the referenced data generation plan.
member.param: The data generator file used to populate the database.
If TRUE, the database is cleared before applying new data.
The database client provider that will be used to connect to the database. This must be .
The connection string for the target database. This must be a connection string to a SQL database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.Conditions.ExecutionTimeCondition.Assert(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.ExecutionResult[])
member.param: The context used to verify the state of the database, if needed. The contained within the context must be open.
An array of instances.
member.exception: If the value of is greater than the maximum execution time.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.Conditions.ExecutionTimeCondition.ExecutionTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time that is required to execute the test.
member.exception:
If the value is less than the minimum execution time or greater than the maximum execution time as indicated by the .
By default, the minimum execution time is set to 0 hours, 0 minutes, and 0 seconds; the maximum execution time is set to 24 hours, 0 minutes, 0 seconds.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TeamSystem.Data.UnitTesting.Conditions.ExecutionTimeCondition.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
